name: Number Link - Picture Puzzle
description:
Number Link is an amazing combination of picture and number link puzzle games. Find the right paths between numbers and reveal hidden images on the board! Install to try it now and you won't be able to stop!

How to play:

- Find the right path between pairs of matching numbers.
- Numbers in this pair show you the length of the path.
- Color these paths and reveal the hidden picture.
- Use hints to boost your progress.
- Get extra lives if you’ve made a mistake.
- Note: none of the cells should stay empty.

How to become a Number Link master:

- There is no time limit or rush. Think one step ahead if you have to face a difficult move.
- Try to take a wider view and analyse all the paths around your move.
- Find your zen by balancing between brain training and the joy of revealing new pictures.

Challenge yourself and enjoy hours of fun with Number Link!
